trans-unit.source: Returns a Tcl list describing the target interpreter for an alias. The alias is specified with an interpreter path and source command name, just as in interp alias above. The name of the target interpreter is returned as an interpreter path, relative to the invoking interpreter. If the target interpreter for the alias is not the invoking interpreter or one of its descendants then an error is generated. The target command does not have to be defined at the time of this invocation.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing two elements, both of which are real fractions between 0 and 1. The first element gives the position of the first visible pixel of the first character (or image, etc) in the top line in the window, relative to the text as a whole (0.5 means it is halfway through the text, for example). The second element gives the position of the first pixel just after the last visible one in the bottom line of the window, relative to the text as a whole. These are the same values passed to scrollbars via the -yscrollcommand option.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含两个元素的列表，这两个元素都是介于0和1之间的实数。第一个元素给出窗口顶部行中第一个字符（或图像等）的第一个可见像素相对于窗口的位置。整个文本（例如，0.5表示它位于文本的中间）。第二个元素给出相对于整个文本而言，在窗口底行中最后一个可见像素之后的第一个像素的位置。这些是通过-yscrollcommand选项传递给滚动条的相同值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing two elements, both of which are real fractions between 0 and 1. The first element gives the position of the listbox element at the top of the window, relative to the listbox as a whole (0.5 means it is halfway through the listbox, for example). The second element gives the position of the listbox element just after the last one in the window, relative to the listbox as a whole. These are the same values passed to scrollbars via the -yscrollcommand option.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含两个元素的列表，这两个元素都是介于0和1之间的实数。第一个元素给出列表框元素在窗口顶部的位置，相对于整个列表框（0.5表示它位于列表框的中途）列表框）。第二个元素给出列表框元素在窗口中最后一个元素之后的位置，相对于整个列表框。这些是通过-yscrollcommand选项传递给滚动条的相同值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing two elements. Each element is a real fraction between 0 and 1; together they describe the horizontal span that is visible in the window. For example, if the first element is .2 and the second element is .6, 20% of the canvas's area (as defined by the -scrollregion option) is off-screen to the left, the middle 40% is visible in the window, and 40% of the canvas is off-screen to the right. These are the same values passed to scrollbars via the -xscrollcommand option.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含两个元素的列表。每个元素都是0到1之间的实数；它们一起描述了在窗口中可见的水平跨度。例如，如果第一个元素为.2，第二个元素为.6，则画布的20％区域（由-scrollregion选项定义）位于屏幕左侧，中间的40％在窗口中可见，并且40％的画布位于屏幕右侧。这些是通过-xscrollcommand选项传递给滚动条的相同值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing two elements. Each element is a real fraction between 0 and 1; together they describe the horizontal span that is visible in the window. For example, if the first element is .2 and the second element is .6, 20% of the entry's text is off-screen to the left, the middle 40% is visible in the window, and 40% of the text is off-screen to the right. These are the same values passed to scrollbars via the -xscrollcommand option.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含两个元素的列表。每个元素都是0到1之间的实数；它们一起描述了在窗口中可见的水平跨度。例如，如果第一个元素为.2而第二个元素为.6，则条目文本的20％不在屏幕左侧，中间的40％在窗口中可见，而40％的文本处于关闭状态屏幕右侧。这些是通过-xscrollcommand选项传递给滚动条的相同值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing two elements. Each element is a real fraction between 0 and 1; together they describe the horizontal span that is visible in the window. For example, if the first element is .2 and the second element is .6, 20% of the listbox's text is off-screen to the left, the middle 40% is visible in the window, and 40% of the text is off-screen to the right. These are the same values passed to scrollbars via the -xscrollcommand option.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含两个元素的列表。每个元素都是0到1之间的实数；它们一起描述了在窗口中可见的水平跨度。例如，如果第一个元素为.2，第二个元素为.6，则列表框的文本的20％不在屏幕左侧，中间的40％在窗口中可见，而40％的文本处于关闭状态屏幕右侧。这些是通过-xscrollcommand选项传递给滚动条的相同值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing two elements. Each element is a real fraction between 0 and 1; together they describe the horizontal span that is visible in the window. For example, if the first element is .2 and the second element is .6, 20% of the spinbox's text is off-screen to the left, the middle 40% is visible in the window, and 40% of the text is off-screen to the right. These are the same values passed to scrollbars via the -xscrollcommand option.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含两个元素的列表。每个元素都是0到1之间的实数；它们一起描述了在窗口中可见的水平跨度。例如，如果第一个元素为.2，第二个元素为.6，则旋转框的文本的20％不在屏幕左侧，中间的40％在窗口中可见，而40％的文本处于关闭状态屏幕右侧。这些是通过-xscrollcommand选项传递给滚动条的相同值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing two elements. Each element is a real fraction between 0 and 1; together they describe the portion of the document's horizontal span that is visible in the window. For example, if the first element is .2 and the second element is .6, 20% of the text is off-screen to the left, the middle 40% is visible in the window, and 40% of the text is off-screen to the right. The fractions refer only to the lines that are actually visible in the window: if the lines in the window are all very short, so that they are entirely visible, the returned fractions will be 0 and 1, even if there are other lines in the text that are much wider than the window. These are the same values passed to scrollbars via the -xscrollcommand option.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含两个元素的列表。每个元素都是0到1之间的实数；它们一起描述了在窗口中可见的文档水平范围的一部分。例如，如果第一个元素为.2，第二个元素为.6，则20％的文本不在屏幕左侧，中间的40％在窗口中可见，而40％的文本在屏幕外-屏幕向右。分数仅指窗口中实际可见的线：如果窗口中的线都非常短，因此它们完全可见，则返回的分数将为0和1，即使窗口中还有其他线也是如此。比窗口宽得多的文本。这些是通过-xscrollcommand选项传递给滚动条的相同值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list containing two elements. Each element is a real fraction between 0 and 1; together they describe the vertical span that is visible in the window. For example, if the first element is .6 and the second element is 1.0, the lowest 40% of the canvas's area (as defined by the -scrollregion option) is visible in the window. These are the same values passed to scrollbars via the -yscrollcommand option.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含两个元素的列表。每个元素都是0到1之间的实数；它们一起描述了在窗口中可见的垂直跨度。例如，如果第一个元素为.6，第二个元素为1.0，则在窗口中可见画布面积的最低40％（由-scrollregion选项定义）。这些是通过-yscrollcommand选项传递给滚动条的相同值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of one or two elements, the first of which is the name of the filesystem to use for the file, and the second, if given, an arbitrary string representing the filesystem-specific nature or type of the location within that filesystem. If a filesystem only supports one type of file, the second element may not be supplied. For example the native files have a first element “native”, and a second element which when given is a platform-specific type name for the file's system (e.g. “NTFS”, “FAT”, on Windows). A generic virtual file system might return the list “vfs ftp” to represent a file on a remote ftp site mounted as a virtual filesystem through an extension called “vfs”. If the file does not belong to any filesystem, an error is generated.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个或两个元素的列表，第一个元素是用于文件的文件系统的名称，第二个（如果给定的话）是一个任意字符串，表示文件系统特定的性质或该文件系统中位置的类型。如果文件系统仅支持一种类型的文件，则可能不提供第二个元素。例如，本机文件具有第一个元素“ native”和第二个元素，当给定它们是文件系统的特定于平台的类型名称（例如Windows上的“ NTFS”，“ FAT”）。通用虚拟文件系统可能会返回列表“ vfs ftp”，以表示通过称为“ vfs”的扩展名作为虚拟文件系统挂载的远程ftp站点上的文件。如果该文件不属于任何文件系统，则会生成错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns a unique normalized path representation for the file-system object (file, directory, link, etc), whose string value can be used as a unique identifier for it. A normalized path is an absolute path which has all “../” and “./” removed. Also it is one which is in the “standard” format for the native platform. On Unix, this means the segments leading up to the path must be free of symbolic links/aliases (but the very last path component may be a symbolic link), and on Windows it also means we want the long form with that form's case-dependence (which gives us a unique, case-dependent path). The one exception concerning the last link in the path is necessary, because Tcl or the user may wish to operate on the actual symbolic link itself (for example file delete, file rename, file copy are defined to operate on symbolic links, not on the things that they point to).
trans-unit.target: 返回文件系统对象（文件，目录，链接等）的唯一标准化路径表示，其字符串值可用作其唯一标识符。规范化路径是绝对路径，其中所有“ ../”和“ ./”都已删除。它也是本机平台的“标准”格式。在Unix上，这意味着通向路径的段必须没有符号链接/别名（但是最后一个路径组件可能是符号链接），而在Windows上，这也意味着我们希望使用该格式的大小写形式的长格式-依赖关系（这为我们提供了一个独特的，视情况而定的路径）。关于路径中最后一个链接的一个例外是必要的，因为Tcl或用户可能希望对实际的符号链接本身进行操作（例如，文件delete，文件重命名，文件副本的定义是对符号链接进行操作，而不是对它们所指向的内容进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether each argument is equal to the arguments on each side of it using exact string comparison. If fewer than two arguments are given, this operation always returns a true value.
trans-unit.target: 使用精确的字符串比较,返回每个参数是否与它两边的参数相等。如果给定的参数少于两个,这个操作总是返回一个真值。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the arbitrarily-many arguments are ordered, with each argument after the first having to be equal to or less than the one preceding it. Comparisons are performed preferentially on the numeric values, and are otherwise performed using UNICODE string comparison. If fewer than two arguments are present, this operation always returns a true value. When the arguments are numeric but should be compared as strings, the string compare command should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否将任意多个参数排序，第一个参数之后的每个参数必须等于或小于它前面的参数。比较优先于数值进行，否则使用UNICODE字符串比较进行。如果存在少于两个参数，则此操作将始终返回一个真值。当参数为数字但应作为字符串进行比较时，应使用字符串比较命令。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the arbitrarily-many arguments are ordered, with each argument after the first having to be equal to or more than the one preceding it. Comparisons are performed preferentially on the numeric values, and are otherwise performed using UNICODE string comparison. If fewer than two arguments are present, this operation always returns a true value. When the arguments are numeric but should be compared as strings, the string compare command should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回是否将任意多个参数排序，第一个参数之后的每个参数必须等于或大于它前面的参数。比较优先于数值进行，否则使用UNICODE字符串比较进行。如果存在少于两个参数，则此操作将始终返回一个真值。当参数为数字但应作为字符串进行比较时，应使用字符串比较命令。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the arbitrarily-many arguments are ordered, with each argument after the first having to be strictly less than the one preceding it. trans-unit.source: Returns whether the arbitrarily-many arguments are ordered, with each argument after the first having to be strictly more than the one preceding it. trans-unit.source: Safe Tcl allows a master interpreter to create safe, restricted interpreters that contain a set of predefined aliases for the source, load, file, encoding, and exit commands and are able to use the auto-loading and package mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: Safe Tcl允许主解释器创建安全的，受限制的解释器，这些解释器包含用于source，load，file，encoding和exit命令的一组预定义别名，并且能够使用自动加载和打包机制。

trans-unit.source: Safe Tcl does not attempt to completely prevent annoyance and denial of service attacks. These forms of attack prevent the application or user from temporarily using the computer to perform useful work, for example by consuming all available CPU time or all available screen real estate. These attacks, while aggravating, are deemed to be of lesser importance in general than integrity and privacy attacks that Safe Tcl is to prevent.
trans-unit.target: Safe Tcl并不试图完全防止烦扰和拒绝服务攻击。这些形式的攻击使应用程序或用户暂时无法使用计算机进行有用的工作,例如消耗所有可用的CPU时间或所有可用的屏幕空间。这些攻击虽然很严重,但一般来说被认为不如Safe Tcl要防止的完整性和隐私攻击重要。

trans-unit.source: Safe Tcl ensures that untrusted Tcl scripts cannot harm the hosting application. It prevents integrity and privacy attacks. Untrusted Tcl scripts are prevented from corrupting the state of the hosting application or computer. Untrusted scripts are also prevented from disclosing information stored on the hosting computer or in the hosting application to any party.
trans-unit.target: Safe Tcl确保不受信任的Tcl脚本不能伤害托管应用程序。它可以防止完整性和隐私攻击。不受信任的Tcl脚本不会破坏托管应用程序或计算机的状态。不受信任的脚本也不能向任何一方透露存储在托管计算机上或托管应用程序中的信息。

trans-unit.source: Safe Tcl is a mechanism for executing untrusted Tcl scripts safely and for providing mediated access by such scripts to potentially dangerous functionality.
trans-unit.target: Safe Tcl是一种安全执行不受信任的Tcl脚本的机制,并为这些脚本提供对潜在危险功能的中介访问。

trans-unit.source: Safe Tk is based on Safe Tcl, which provides a mechanism that allows restricted and mediated access to auto-loading and packages for safe interpreters. Safe Tk adds the ability to configure the interpreter for safe Tk operations and load Tk into safe interpreters.
trans-unit.target: Safe Tk基于Safe Tcl,它提供了一种机制,允许安全解释器的自动加载和包的受限和中介访问。Safe Tk增加了为安全Tk操作配置解释器和将Tk加载到安全解释器中的功能。

trans-unit.source: Safe interpreters
trans-unit.target: 安全的口译员

trans-unit.source: Safe interpreters are not allowed to invoke hidden commands in themselves or in their descendants. This prevents safe slaves from gaining access to hidden functionality in themselves or their descendants.
trans-unit.target: 安全解释者不允许在自己或其后代中调用隐藏的命令。这就防止了安全奴隶在自己或自己的后代中获取隐藏的功能。

trans-unit.source: Safe interpreters greatly restrict the functionality available to Tcl programs executing within them. Allowing the untrusted Tcl program to have direct access to this functionality is unsafe, because it can be used for a variety of attacks on the environment. However, there are times when there is a legitimate need to use the dangerous functionality in the context of the safe interpreter. For example, sometimes a program must be sourced into the interpreter. Another example is Tk, where windows are bound to the hierarchy of windows for a specific interpreter; some potentially dangerous functions, e.g. window management, must be performed on these windows within the interpreter context.
trans-unit.target: 安全解释器极大地限制了在其中执行的Tcl程序可用的功能。允许不受信任的Tcl程序直接访问此功能是不安全的，因为它可用于对环境的多种攻击。但是，有时候确实有必要在安全解释器的上下文中使用危险功能。例如，有时必须将程序作为解释器的源代码。另一个例子是Tk，其中窗口绑定到特定解释程序的窗口层次结构。必须在解释器上下文中在这些窗口上执行某些潜在危险的功能，例如窗口管理。

trans-unit.source: Searches the specified directory for files that match the language specifications returned by ::msgcat::mcloadedlocales get (or msgcat::mcpackagelocale preferences if a package locale is set) (note that these are all lowercase), extended by the file extension “.msg”. Each matching file is read in order, assuming a UTF-8 encoding. The file contents are then evaluated as a Tcl script. This means that Unicode characters may be present in the message file either directly in their UTF-8 encoded form, or by use of the backslash-u quoting recognized by Tcl evaluation. The number of message files which matched the specification and were loaded is returned.
trans-unit.target: 在指定目录中搜​​索与:: msgcat :: mcloadedlocales get（如果设置了软件包区域设置，则为msgcat :: mcpackagelocale首选项）返回的语言规范相匹配的文件（请注意，这些均为小写），并以文件扩展名“。”扩展。味精”。假定使用UTF-8编码，则按顺序读取每个匹配的文件。然后，将文件内容评估为Tcl脚本。这意味着Unicode字符可以直接以其UTF-8编码形式或通过使用Tcl评估识别的反斜杠-u引号出现在消息文件中。返回符合规范并已加载的消息文件数。

trans-unit.source: Sends a broadcast message to the system and running programs to notify them of certain updates. This is necessary to propagate changes to key registry keys like Environment. The timeout specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for applications to respond to the broadcast message. It defaults to 3000. The following example demonstrates how to add a path to the global Environment and notify applications of the change without requiring a logoff/logon step (assumes admin privileges):
trans-unit.target: 向系统和正在运行的程序发送广播信息,以通知它们某些更新。这对于传播环境等关键注册表键的更改是必要的。超时指定了等待应用程序响应广播消息的时间,以毫秒为单位。它的默认值是3000。下面的例子演示了如何在不需要注销/登录步骤的情况下,添加全局环境的路径并通知应用程序有关更改(假设有管理员权限)。

trans-unit.source: Separators are inserted automatically when the -autoseparators widget option is true. You can insert separators programmatically as well. If a separator is already present at the top of the undo stack no other will be inserted. That means that two separators on the undo stack are always separated by at least one insert or delete action.
trans-unit.target: 当-autoseparators小部件选项为true 时，将自动插入分隔符。您也可以以编程方式插入分隔符。如果在撤消堆栈的顶部已经存在分隔符，则不会插入其他任何分隔符。这意味着撤消堆栈上的两个分隔符始终由至少一个插入或删除操作分隔。

trans-unit.source: Server channels cannot be used for input or output; their sole use is to accept new client connections. The channels created for each incoming client connection are opened for input and output. Closing the server channel shuts down the server so that no new connections will be accepted; however, existing connections will be unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 服务器通道不能用于输入或输出;它们的唯一用途是接受新的客户端连接。为每个传入的客户端连接创建的通道被打开,用于输入和输出。关闭服务器通道会关闭服务器,这样就不会接受新的连接;但是,现有的连接将不受影响。

trans-unit.source: Server sockets
trans-unit.target: 服务器插座

trans-unit.source: Server sockets depend on the Tcl event mechanism to find out when new connections are opened. If the application does not enter the event loop, for example by invoking the vwait command or calling the C procedure Tcl_DoOneEvent, then no connections will be accepted.
trans-unit.target: 服务器套接字依赖于Tcl事件机制来确定何时打开新连接。如果应用程序没有进入事件循环，例如通过调用vwait命令或调用C过程Tcl_DoOneEvent，则将不接受任何连接。

trans-unit.source: Sets a Tcl script run when the idle worker thread exits . This is normaly used to cleanup the state of the worker thread, release reserved resources, cleanup memory and such . Default value for this option is unspecified, thus no Tcl script will run on the worker thread exit .
trans-unit.target: 设置当空闲的工作线程退出时运行的Tcl脚本,通常用于清理工作线程的状态,释放预留资源,清理内存等。这通常用于清理工作线程的状态,释放保留的资源,清理内存等。这个选项的默认值是未指定的,因此在工作线程退出时不会运行Tcl脚本。

trans-unit.source: Sets a Tcl script used to initialize new worker thread . This is usually used to load packages and commands in the worker, set default variables, create namespaces, and such . If the passed script runs into a Tcl error, the worker will not be created and the initiating command (either the tpool::create or tpool::post) will throw error . Default value for this option is unspecified, hence, the Tcl interpreter of the worker thread will contain just the initial set of Tcl commands .
trans-unit.target: 设置用于初始化新工作线程的Tcl脚本。通常用于在工作程序中加载程序包和命令，设置默认变量，创建名称空间等。如果传递的脚本遇到Tcl错误，则不会创建工作程序，并且启动命令（tpool :: create或tpool :: post）将引发error。未指定此选项的默认值，因此，工作线程的Tcl解释器将仅包含Tcl命令的初始集合。

trans-unit.source: Since the encoding of a SQLite3 database is always well known, the -encoding option accepts only utf-8 as an encoding and always returns utf-8 for an encoding. The actual encoding may be set using a SQLite3 PRAGMA statement when creating a new database.
trans-unit.target: 由于SQLite3数据库的编码始终是众所周知的，因此-encoding选项仅接受utf-8作为编码，并且始终返回utf-8作为编码。创建新数据库时，可以使用SQLite3 PRAGMA语句设置实际编码。

trans-unit.source: Sizegrip widgets support the standard cget, configure, identify, instate, and state methods. No other widget methods are used.
trans-unit.target: Sizegrip部件支持标准cget，配置，标识，instate和状态的方法。没有使用其他小部件方法。

trans-unit.source: Sizes should normally be specified in points so the application will remain the same ruler size on the screen, even when changing screen resolutions or moving scripts across platforms. However, specifying pixels is useful in certain circumstances such as when a piece of text must line up with respect to a fixed-size bitmap. The mapping between points and pixels is set when the application starts, based on properties of the installed monitor, but it can be overridden by calling the tk scaling command.
trans-unit.target: 通常应以磅为单位指定大小，以便即使在更改屏幕分辨率或跨平台移动脚本时，应用程序在屏幕上也将保持相同的标尺大小。但是，指定像素在某些情况下很有用，例如当一条文本必须相对于固定大小的位图对齐时。点和像素之间的映射是在应用程序启动时根据安装的监视器的属性设置的，但是可以通过调用tk scale命令来覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: Some databases support the idea of a single statement that returns multiple sets of results. The nextresults object command is executed, typically after the nextlist of nextdict object command has returned 0, to advance to the next result set. It returns 1 if there is another result set to process, and 0 if the result set just processed was the last. After calling nextresults and getting the return value of 1, the caller may once again call columns to get the column descriptions of the next result set, and then return to calling nextdict or nextlist to process the rows of the next result set. It is an error to call columns, nextdict, nextlist or nextrow after nextresults has returned 0.
trans-unit.target: 一些数据库支持单个语句返回多组结果的想法。所述nextresults执行命令对象，典型的后nextlist的nextdict对象命令返回0，以进到下一个结果集。如果还有另一个要处理的结果集，则返回1；如果刚处理的结果集是最后一个，则返回0。在调用nextresults并获得返回值1之后，调用方可以再次调用列以获取下一个结果集的列描述，然后返回调用nextdict或nextlist处理下一个结果集的行。在nextresults返回0之后，调用column，nextdict，nextlist或nextrow是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Some of Tcl's built-in commands evaluate scripts as part of their functioning. These commands can make use of exceptional return codes to enable special features. For example, the built-in Tcl commands that provide loops — such as while, for, and foreach — evaluate a script that is the body of the loop. If evaluation of the loop body returns the return code of TCL_BREAK or TCL_CONTINUE, the loop command can react in such a way as to give the break and continue commands their documented interpretation in loops.
trans-unit.target: Tcl的某些内置命令将脚本作为其功能的一部分进行评估。这些命令可以利用特殊的返回码来启用特殊功能。例如，提供循环的内置Tcl命令（例如while，for和foreach）将评估作为循环主体的脚本。如果对循环体的求值返回TCL_BREAK或TCL_CONTINUE的返回码，则循环命令可以作出反应，以给出中断并在循环中继续其记录的解释。

trans-unit.source: Some packages, for instance packages which use namespaces and export commands or those which require special initialization, might select that their package files be loaded immediately upon package require instead of delaying the actual loading to the first use of one of the package's command. This is the default mode when generating the package index. It can be overridden by specifying the -lazy argument.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a Tcl command to associate with the button. This command is typically invoked when mouse button 1 is released over the button window.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个与按钮相关联的Tcl命令。当在按钮窗口上释放鼠标按钮1时,通常会调用该命令。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a Tcl command to associate with the button. This command is typically invoked when mouse button 1 is released over the button window. The button's global variable (-variable option) will be updated before the command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 指定与该按钮关联的Tcl命令。当在按钮窗口上释放鼠标按钮1时，通常会调用此命令。在调用命令之前，将更新按钮的全局变量（-variable选项）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a Tcl command to be invoked whenever a spinbutton is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 指定每当调用旋钮时要调用的 Tcl 命令。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a Tcl command to execute when the menu entry is invoked. Not available for separator or tear-off entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定菜单项被调用时要执行的Tcl命令。不适用于分隔符或分离符。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a Tcl command to invoke whenever a spinbutton is invoked. The command recognizes several percent substitutions: %W for the widget path, %s for the current value of the widget, and %d for the direction of the button pressed (up or down).
trans-unit.target: 指定每当调用spinbutton时要调用的Tcl命令。该命令可识别百分比替换：％W表示小部件路径，％s表示小部件的当前值，％d表示所按按钮的方向（向上或向下）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a Tcl script that may be evaluated to create the window for the annotation. If no -window option has been specified for the annotation this script will be evaluated when the annotation is about to be displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 指定可以评估以创建注释窗口的Tcl脚本。如果未为注释指定-window选项，则将在屏幕上显示注释时将评估此脚本。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a background color for the image in any of the standard ways accepted by Tk. If this option is set to an empty string then the background pixels will be transparent. This effect is achieved by using the source bitmap as the mask bitmap, ignoring any -maskdata or -maskfile options.
trans-unit.target: 用Tk接受的任何标准方式为图像指定背景色。如果将此选项设置为空字符串，则背景像素将是透明的。通过将源位图用作掩码位图，而忽略任何-maskdata或-maskfile选项，可以实现此效果。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a background color to use for displaying this entry when it is active. If this option is specified as an empty string (the default), then the -activebackground option for the overall menu is used. If the tk_strictMotif variable has been set to request strict Motif compliance, then this option is ignored and the -background option is used in its place. This option is not available for separator or tear-off entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定背景色，用于在其处于活动状态时显示该条目。如果将此选项指定为空字符串（默认值），则使用整个菜单的-activebackground选项。如果将tk_strictMotif变量设置为请求严格的Motif遵从性，则将忽略此选项，并在其位置使用-background选项。此选项不适用于分隔符或撕下条目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a background color to use for displaying this entry when it is in the normal state (neither active nor disabled). If this option is specified as an empty string (the default), then the -background option for the overall menu is used. This option is not available for separator or tear-off entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定背景色，当它处于正常状态（未激活或禁用）时，用于显示该条目。如果将此选项指定为空字符串（默认值），则使用整个菜单的-background选项。此选项不适用于分隔符或撕下条目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a background color to use when the button is selected. If -indicatoron is true then the color applies to the indicator. Under Windows, this color is used as the background for the indicator regardless of the select state. If -indicatoron is false, this color is used as the background for the entire widget, in place of -background or -activeBackground, whenever the widget is selected. If specified as an empty string then no special color is used for displaying when the widget is selected.
trans-unit.target: 指定选择按钮时要使用的背景色。如果-indicatoron为true，则颜色应用于指示器。在Windows下，无论选择状态如何，此颜色都将用作指示器的背景。如果-indicatoron为false，则每当选择该小部件时，该颜色就会用作整个小部件的背景，而不是-background或-activeBackground。如果指定为空字符串，则在选择窗口小部件时不会显示任何特殊颜色。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a background color to use when the button is selected. If indicatorOn is true then the color is used as the background for the indicator regardless of the select state. If indicatorOn is false, this color is used as the background for the entire widget, in place of background or activeBackground, whenever the widget is selected. If specified as an empty string then no special color is used for displaying when the widget is selected.
trans-unit.target: 指定选择按钮时要使用的背景色。如果indicatorOn为true，则无论选择状态如何，该颜色均用作指示器的背景。如果indicatorOn为false，则每次选择小部件时，此颜色都将用作整个小部件的背景，而不是background或activeBackground。如果指定为空字符串，则在选择窗口小部件时不会显示任何特殊颜色。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a bitmap to display in the menu instead of a textual label, in any of the forms accepted by Tk_GetBitmap. This option overrides the -label option (as controlled by the -compound option) but may be reset to an empty string to enable a textual label to be displayed. If a -image option has been specified, it overrides -bitmap. This option is not available for separator or tear-off entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定以Tk_GetBitmap接受的任何形式在菜单中显示的位图，而不是文本标签。此选项将覆盖-label选项（由-compound选项控制），但可以重置为空字符串以显示文本标签。如果指定了-image选项，它将覆盖-bitmap。该选项不适用于分隔符或撕下条目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a bitmap to display in the widget, in any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetBitmap. The exact way in which the bitmap is displayed may be affected by other options such as -anchor or -justify. Typically, if this option is specified then it overrides other options that specify a textual value to display in the widget but this is controlled by the -compound option; the -bitmap option may be reset to an empty string to re-enable a text display. In widgets that support both -bitmap and -image options, -image will usually override -bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 以Tk_GetBitmap可接受的任何形式指定要在小部件中显示的位图。位图的确切显示方式可能会受到其他选项（例如-anchor或-justify）的影响。通常，如果指定了此选项，则它将覆盖其他选项，这些选项指定要在小部件中显示的文本值，但这由-compound选项控制；该-bitmap选项可被重置为空字符串，以重新启用一个文本显示。在同时支持-bitmap和-image选项的小部件中，-image通常会覆盖-bitmap。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a boolean that says whether separators are automatically inserted in the undo stack. Only meaningful when the -undo option is true.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个布尔值，该布尔值说明是否将分隔符自动插入到撤消堆栈中。仅在-undo选项为true 时才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a boolean that says whether the blinking insertion cursor should be drawn as a character-sized rectangular block. If false (the default) a thin vertical line is used for the insertion cursor.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个布尔值,用于说明是否应该将闪烁的插入光标绘制成一个字符大小的矩形块。如果为false(默认值),则插入光标将使用一条细的垂直线。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a boolean that says whether the undo mechanism is active or not.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个布尔值,表示撤销机制是否激活。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a boolean value indicating whether or not the current value of the scale is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个布尔值,表示是否要显示刻度尺的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a boolean value that determines whether this widget controls the resizing grid for its top-level window. This option is typically used in text widgets, where the information in the widget has a natural size (the size of a character) and it makes sense for the window's dimensions to be integral numbers of these units. These natural window sizes form a grid. If the -setgrid option is set to true then the widget will communicate with the window manager so that when the user interactively resizes the top-level window that contains the widget, the dimensions of the window will be displayed to the user in grid units and the window size will be constrained to integral numbers of grid units. See the section GRIDDED GEOMETRY MANAGEMENT in the wm manual entry for more details.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个布尔值，该值确定此窗口小部件是否控制其顶层窗口的大小调整网格。此选项通常用于文本窗口小部件，其中窗口小部件中的信息具有自然大小（字符的大小），并且使窗口的尺寸为这些单位的整数是有意义的。这些自然窗口大小形成一个网格。如果-setgrid选项设置为true，则该小部件将与窗口管理器通信，以便当用户以交互方式调整包含该小部件的顶级窗口的大小时，该窗口的尺寸将以网格单位显示给用户。窗口大小将限制为网格单元的整数。请参见网格几何管理的WM 手动输入以获取更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a boolean value that indicates whether or not it should be allowable to set the canvas's view outside the region defined by the scrollRegion argument. Defaults to true, which means that the view will be constrained within the scroll region.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个布尔值，该值指示是否应允许在scrollRegion参数定义的区域之外设置画布的视图。默认为true，这意味着视图将被限制在滚动区域内。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a character index offset into the string to start matching the regular expression at. The
trans-unit.target: 指定字符串中的字符索引偏移量,以开始匹配正则表达式。匹配正则表达式的

trans-unit.source: Specifies a class for the window. This class will be used when querying the option database for the window's other options, and it will also be used later for other purposes such as bindings. The -class option may not be changed with the configure widget command.
trans-unit.target: 指定窗口的类。当在选项数据库中查询窗口的其他选项时，将使用该类，并且稍后还将将其用于其他目的，例如绑定。该-class选项可能无法与改变配置组件命令。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a colormap to use for the window. The value may be either new, in which case a new colormap is created for the window and its children, or the name of another window (which must be on the same screen and have the same visual as
trans-unit.target: 指定要用于窗口的颜色图。该值可以是new，在这种情况下，将为该窗口及其子级创建一个新的颜色图，或者是另一个窗口的名称（该窗口必须在同一屏幕上，并且具有与

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired height for the button. If an image or bitmap is being displayed in the button then the value is in screen units (i.e. any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels); for text it is in lines of text. If this option is not specified, the button's desired height is computed from the size of the image or bitmap or text being displayed in it.
trans-unit.target: 指定按钮的期望高度。如果按钮中显示图像或位图，则该值以屏幕单位（即Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式）；对于文本，它是文本行。如果未指定此选项，则按钮的所需高度是根据其中显示的图像或位图或文本的大小来计算的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired height for the label. If an image or bitmap is being displayed in the label then the value is in screen units (i.e. any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels); for text it is in lines of text. If this option is not specified, the label's desired height is computed from the size of the image or bitmap or text being displayed in it.
trans-unit.target: 指定标签的期望高度。如果在标签中显示图像或位图，则该值以屏幕单位（即Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式）；对于文本，它是文本行。如果未指定此选项，则标签的所需高度是根据其中显示的图像或位图或文本的大小来计算的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired height for the menubutton. If an image or bitmap is being displayed in the menubutton then the value is in screen units (i.e. any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels); for text it is in lines of text. If this option is not specified, the menubutton's desired height is computed from the size of the image or bitmap or text being displayed in it.
trans-unit.target: 指定菜单按钮的所需高度。如果在菜单按钮中显示图像或位图，则该值以屏幕单位（即Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式）；对于文本，它是文本行。如果未指定此选项，则菜单按钮的所需高度是根据其中显示的图像或位图或文本的大小来计算的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired height for the overall panedwindow widget. May be any value accepted by Tk_GetPixels. If an empty string, the widget will be made high enough to allow all contained widgets to have their natural height.
trans-unit.target: 为整个窗格窗口小部件指定所需的高度。可以是Tk_GetPixels接受的任何值。如果为空字符串，则将使小部件足够高以允许所有包含的小部件具有其自然高度。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired width for the button. If an image or bitmap is being displayed in the button then the value is in screen units (i.e. any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels). For a text button (no image or with -compound none) then the width specifies how much space in characters to allocate for the text label. If the width is negative then this specifies a minimum width. If this option is not specified, the button's desired width is computed from the size of the image or bitmap or text being displayed in it.
trans-unit.target: 指定按钮的所需宽度。如果按钮中显示图像或位图，则该值以屏幕为单位（即Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式）。对于文本按钮（无图像或使用-compound none），宽度指定字符中为文本标签分配的空间。如果宽度为负，则指定最小宽度。如果未指定此选项，则按钮的所需宽度是根据其中显示的图像或位图或文本的大小来计算的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired width for the button. If an image or bitmap is being displayed in the button then the value is in screen units (i.e. any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels); for text it is in characters. If this option is not specified, the button's desired width is computed from the size of the image or bitmap or text being displayed in it.
trans-unit.target: 指定按钮的所需宽度。如果按钮中显示图像或位图，则该值以屏幕单位（即Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式）；对于文本，以字符为单位。如果未指定此选项，则按钮的所需宽度是根据其中显示的图像或位图或文本的大小来计算的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired width for the button. If an image or bitmap is being displayed in the button, the value is in screen units (i.e. any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels); for text it is in characters. If this option is not specified, the button's desired width is computed from the size of the image or bitmap or text being displayed in it.
trans-unit.target: 指定按钮的所需宽度。如果在按钮中显示图像或位图，则该值以屏幕单位（即Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式）；对于文本，以字符为单位。如果未指定此选项，则按钮的所需宽度是根据其中显示的图像或位图或文本的大小来计算的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired width for the label. If an image or bitmap is being displayed in the label then the value is in screen units (i.e. any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels); for text it is in characters. If this option is not specified, the label's desired width is computed from the size of the image or bitmap or text being displayed in it.
trans-unit.target: 指定标签的所需宽度。如果在标签中显示图像或位图，则该值以屏幕单位（即Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式）；对于文本，以字符为单位。如果未指定此选项，则标签的所需宽度是根据其中显示的图像或位图或文本的大小来计算的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired width for the menubutton. If an image or bitmap is being displayed in the menubutton then the value is in screen units (i.e. any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels); for text it is in characters. If this option is not specified, the menubutton's desired width is computed from the size of the image or bitmap or text being displayed in it.
trans-unit.target: 指定菜单按钮的所需宽度。如果在菜单按钮中显示图像或位图，则该值以屏幕单位（即Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式）；对于文本，以字符为单位。如果未指定此选项，则菜单按钮的所需宽度是根据其中显示的图像或位图或文本的大小来计算的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired width for the overall panedwindow widget. May be any value accepted by Tk_GetPixels. If an empty string, the widget will be made wide enough to allow all contained widgets to have their natural width.
trans-unit.target: 为整个窗格窗口小部件指定所需的宽度。可以是Tk_GetPixels接受的任何值。如果为空字符串，则将使小部件足够宽，以允许所有包含的小部件具有其自然宽度。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired window height that the canvas widget should request from its geometry manager. The value may be specified in any of the forms described in the COORDINATES section below.
trans-unit.target: 指定画布小部件应从其几何管理器请求的所需窗口高度。该值可以以下面“ 坐标”部分中描述的任何形式指定。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a desired window width that the canvas widget should request from its geometry manager. The value may be specified in any of the forms described in the COORDINATES section below.
trans-unit.target: 指定画布小部件应从其几何管理器请求的所需窗口宽度。该值可以以下面“ 坐标”部分中描述的任何形式指定。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filename to be displayed in the dialog when it pops up.
trans-unit.target: 指定弹出对话框时要显示的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a floating-point value indicating how close the mouse cursor must be to an item before it is considered to be “inside” the item. Defaults to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个浮点值，该值指示鼠标光标在被视为位于项目“内部”之前必须距该项目多近。默认为1.0。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a foreground color for the image in any of the standard ways accepted by Tk.
trans-unit.target: 以Tk接受的任何标准方式为图像指定前景色。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a foreground color to use for displaying this entry when it is active. If this option is specified as an empty string (the default), then the -activeforeground option for the overall menu is used. This option is not available for separator or tear-off entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于激活该条目时用于显示该条目的前景色。如果将此选项指定为空字符串（默认值），则使用整个菜单的-activeforeground选项。此选项不适用于分隔符或撕下条目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a foreground color to use for displaying this entry when it is in the normal state (neither active nor disabled). If this option is specified as an empty string (the default), then the -foreground option for the overall menu is used. This option is not available for separator or tear-off entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定在其处于正常状态（未激活或禁用）时用于显示该条目的前景色。如果将此选项指定为空字符串（默认值），则使用整体菜单的-foreground选项。此选项不适用于分隔符或撕下条目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of elements to place inside the element.
trans-unit.target: 指定要放在元素内部的元素列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list with four coordinates describing the left, top, right, and bottom coordinates of a rectangular region. This region is used for scrolling purposes and is considered to be the boundary of the information in the canvas. Each of the coordinates may be specified in any of the forms given in the COORDINATES section below.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有四个坐标的列表，这些坐标描述矩形区域的左，上，右和下坐标。该区域用于滚动目的，被认为是画布中信息的边界。每个坐标可以以下面“ 坐标”部分给出的任何形式指定。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a maximum line length for the text, in any of the forms described in the COORDINATES section above. If this option is zero (the default) the text is broken into lines only at newline characters. However, if this option is non-zero then any line that would be longer than
trans-unit.target: 以上面COORDINATES部分中描述的任何形式指定文本的最大行长。如果此选项为零（默认值），则文本仅在换行符处分成几行。但是，如果此选项不为零，则任何行的长度将比

trans-unit.source: Specifies a menu widget to be used as a menubar. On the Macintosh, the menubar will be displayed across the top of the main monitor. On Microsoft Windows and all UNIX platforms, the menu will appear across the toplevel window as part of the window dressing maintained by the window manager.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用作menubar的菜单部件。在Macintosh上,menubar将显示在主显示器的顶部。在Microsoft Windows和所有UNIX平台上,该菜单将作为窗口管理器维护的窗口装饰的一部分出现在顶层窗口的对面。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a message to include in the client area of the dialog. This is only available on Mac OS X.
trans-unit.target: 指定要包含在对话框客户端区域的信息。这仅在Mac OS X上可用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a minimum height for the element. If less than zero, the base image's height is used as a default.
trans-unit.target: 指定元素的最小高度。如果小于零,则使用基本图像的高度作为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a minimum width for the element. If less than zero, the base image's width is used as a default.
trans-unit.target: 指定元素的最小宽度。如果小于零,则使用基本图像的宽度作为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative integer value indicating desired aspect ratio for the text. The aspect ratio is specified as 100*width/height. 100 means the text should be as wide as it is tall, 200 means the text should be twice as wide as it is tall, 50 means the text should be twice as tall as it is wide, and so on. Used to choose line length for text if -width option is not specified. Defaults to 150.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负整数值，该值指示文本所需的长宽比。宽高比指定为100 *宽度/高度。100表示​​文本的宽度应等于其高度，200表示文本的宽度应等于其高度的两倍，50表示文本的高度应等于其宽度的两倍，依此类推。如果未指定-width选项，则用于选择文本的行长。默认值为150。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative integer value indicating the number of milliseconds the insertion cursor should remain “off” in each blink cycle. If this option is zero then the cursor does not blink: it is on all the time.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负整数值，该值指示在每个闪烁周期中插入光标应保持“关闭”的毫秒数。如果此选项为零，则光标不会闪烁：它一直都在闪烁。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative integer value indicating the number of milliseconds the insertion cursor should remain “on” in each blink cycle.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负整数值，该值指示在每个闪烁周期中插入光标应保持在“ on”状态的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative value indicating how much extra space to leave on each side of the window in the X-direction. The value may have any of the forms accepted by Tk_GetPixels.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负值，该值指示在X方向上窗口的每一侧要保留多少额外空间。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels接受的任何形式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative value indicating how much extra space to leave on each side of the window in the Y-direction. The value may have any of the forms accepted by Tk_GetPixels.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负值，该值指示在Y方向上的窗口的每一侧上剩余多少剩余空间。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels接受的任何形式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative value indicating how much extra space to request for the widget in the X-direction. The value may have any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels. When computing how large a window it needs, the widget will add this amount to the width it would normally need (as determined by the width of the things displayed in the widget); if the geometry manager can satisfy this request, the widget will end up with extra internal space to the left and/or right of what it displays inside. Most widgets only use this option for padding text: if they are displaying a bitmap or image, then they usually ignore padding options.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负值，该值指示在X方向上为窗口小部件请求多少额外空间。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式。在计算所需的窗口大小时，小部件会将此数量添加到通常需要的宽度（由小部件中显示的事物的宽度确定）；如果几何图形管理器可以满足此请求，则小部件将在其内部显示的内容的左侧和/或右侧增加额外的内部空间。大多数窗口小部件仅使用此选项来填充文本：如果它们显示位图或图像，则通常会忽略填充选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative value indicating how much extra space to request for the widget in the Y-direction. The value may have any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels. When computing how large a window it needs, the widget will add this amount to the height it would normally need (as determined by the height of the things displayed in the widget); if the geometry manager can satisfy this request, the widget will end up with extra internal space above and/or below what it displays inside. Most widgets only use this option for padding text: if they are displaying a bitmap or image, then they usually ignore padding options.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负值，该值指示要在Y方向上为窗口小部件请求多少额外空间。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式。在计算所需的窗口大小时，小部件会将此数量添加到通常需要的高度（由小部件中显示的事物的高度确定）；如果几何图形管理器可以满足此请求，则小部件将在其内部显示内容的上方和/或下方带有额外的内部空间。大多数窗口小部件仅使用此选项来填充文本：如果它们显示位图或图像，则通常会忽略填充选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative value indicating the width of the 3-D border drawn around active elements. See above for definition of active elements. The value may have any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels. This option is typically only available in widgets displaying more than one element at a time (e.g. menus but not buttons).
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负值，该值指示在活动元素周围绘制的3-D边框的宽度。有关活动元素的定义，请参见上文。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式。此选项通常仅在一次显示多个元素的小部件中可用（例如，菜单，但不包含按钮）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative value indicating the width of the 3-D border to draw around selected items. The value may have any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负值，该值指示要在选定项目周围绘制的3-D边框的宽度。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative value indicating the width of the 3-D border to draw around the insertion cursor. The value may have any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负值，该值指示要在插入光标周围绘制的3-D边框的宽度。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative value indicating the width of the 3-D border to draw around the outside of the widget (if such a border is being drawn; the -relief option typically determines this). The value may also be used when drawing 3-D effects in the interior of the widget. The value may have any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负值，该值指示要在窗口小部件外部绘制的3-D边框的宽度（如果正在绘制这样的边框；通常使用-relief选项来确定）。在小部件内部绘制3-D效果时，也可以使用该值。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-negative value indicating the width of the highlight rectangle to draw around the outside of the widget when it has the input focus. The value may have any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels. If the value is zero, no focus highlight is drawn around the widget.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个非负值，该值指示突出显示矩形的宽度，以在其具有输入焦点时在小部件的外部绘制。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式。如果值为零，则不会在窗口小部件周围绘制焦点突出显示。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a real value corresponding to the right or bottom end of the scale. This value may be either less than or greater than the -from option.
trans-unit.target: 指定与刻度的右端或底端相对应的实数值。此值可以小于或大于-from选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a rectangular region of
trans-unit.target: 指定一个矩形区域

trans-unit.source: Specifies a rectangular sub-region of the destination image to be affected. (
trans-unit.target: 指定要影响的目标图像的矩形子区域。(

trans-unit.source: Specifies a rectangular sub-region of the image file data to be copied to the destination image. If only
trans-unit.target: 指定要复制到目标图像的图像文件数据的矩形子区域。如果只有

trans-unit.source: Specifies a rectangular sub-region of the source image to be copied. (
trans-unit.target: 指定要复制的源图像的矩形子区域。(

trans-unit.source: Specifies a script to eval when -validatecommand returns 0. Setting it to an empty string disables this feature (the default). The best use of this option is to set it to
trans-unit.target: 指定当-validatecommand返回0 时要评估的脚本。将其设置为空字符串将禁用此功能（默认）。此选项的最佳用途是将其设置为

trans-unit.source: Specifies a script to eval when -validatecommand returns 0. Setting it to {} disables this feature (the default). The best use of this option is to set it to
trans-unit.target: 指定当-validatecommand返回0 时要评估的脚本。将其设置为{}将禁用此功能（默认）。此选项的最佳用途是将其设置为

trans-unit.source: Specifies a script to eval when you want to validate the input into the entry widget. Setting it to {} disables this feature (the default). This command must return a valid Tcl boolean value. If it returns 0 (or the valid Tcl boolean equivalent) then it means you reject the new edition and it will not occur and the -invalidcommand will be evaluated if it is set. If it returns 1, then the new edition occurs. See VALIDATION below for more information.
trans-unit.target: 指定要验证输入小部件中的输入时要评估的脚本。将其设置为{}将禁用此功能（默认）。此命令必须返回有效的Tcl布尔值。如果返回0（或有效的Tcl布尔等效值），则表示您拒绝新版本，并且不会出现，并且-invalid命令将被评估。如果返回1，则出现新版本。有关更多信息，请参见下面的“ 验证”。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a script to evaluate when you want to validate the input in the widget. Setting it to an empty string disables this feature (the default). Validation occurs according to the value of -validate. This command must return a valid Tcl boolean value. If it returns 0 (or the valid Tcl boolean equivalent) then the value of the widget will not change and the -invalidcommand will be evaluated if it is set. If it returns 1, then value will be changed. See VALIDATION below for more information.
trans-unit.target: 指定要验证小部件中的输入时要评估的脚本。将其设置为空字符串将禁用此功能（默认）。根据-validate的值进行验证。此命令必须返回有效的Tcl布尔值。如果返回0（或有效的Tcl布尔等效值），则小部件的值将不会更改，并且-invalid命令（如果已设置）将被求值。如果返回1，则值将被更改。有关更多信息，请参见下面的“ 验证”。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a set of tab stops for the window. The option's value consists of a list of screen distances giving the positions of the tab stops, each of which is a distance relative to the left edge of the widget (excluding borders, padding, etc). Each position may optionally be followed in the next list element by one of the keywords left, right, center, or numeric, which specifies how to justify text relative to the tab stop. Left is the default; it causes the text following the tab character to be positioned with its left edge at the tab position. Right means that the right edge of the text following the tab character is positioned at the tab position, and center means that the text is centered at the tab position. Numeric means that the decimal point in the text is positioned at the tab position; if there is no decimal point then the least significant digit of the number is positioned just to the left of the tab position; if there is no number in the text then the text is right-justified at the tab position. For example, “-tabs {2c left 4c 6c center}” creates three tab stops at two-centimeter intervals; the first two use left justification and the third uses center justification.
trans-unit.target: 指定窗口的一组制表位。该选项的值包括一系列屏幕距离，这些屏幕距离给出了制表位的位置，每个位置都是相对于小部件左边缘的距离（不包括边框，内边距等）。在下一个列表元素中，每个位置都可以有选择地跟在关键字left，right，center或numeric后面，这些关键字指定相对于制表位的文本对齐方式。左为默认值；它会导致制表符后面的文本的左边缘位于制表符位置。右边表示制表符后面的文本的右边缘位于制表符位置，并居中表示文本在标签位置居中。数字表示文本中的小数点位于制表符位置；如果没有小数点，则该数字的最低有效数字位于制表符位置的左侧；如果文本中没有数字，则文本在制表符位置右对齐。例如，“ -tabs {2c left 4c 6c center} ”以两个厘米的间隔创建三个制表位；前两个使用左对齐，第三个使用中心对齐。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a set of tags to apply to the item.
trans-unit.target: 指定一组应用于项目的标签。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a string that will be appended to the filename if the user enters a filename without an extension. The default value is the empty string, which means no extension will be appended to the filename in any case. This option is ignored on Mac OS X, which does not require extensions to filenames, and the UNIX implementation guesses reasonable values for this from the -filetypes option when this is not supplied.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个字符串，如果用户输入不带扩展名的文件名，该字符串将附加到文件名。默认值为空字符串，这意味着在任何情况下都不会在文件名后附加扩展名。在不需要扩展名的Mac OS X上，此选项将被忽略，并且在不提供文件名的情况下，UNIX实现会从-filetypes选项中猜测出合理的值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a string to be displayed in the tab.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在标签中显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a string to be displayed inside the widget. The way in which the string is displayed depends on the particular widget and may be determined by other options, such as -anchor or -justify.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在小部件内显示的字符串。字符串的显示方式取决于特定的窗口小部件，并且可以由其他选项（例如-anchor或-justify）确定。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a string to display as an identifying label in the menu entry. Not available for separator or tear-off entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个字符串,作为菜单项中的识别标签显示。不可用于分隔符或分离符。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a string to display as the title of the dialog box. If this option is not specified, then a default title is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个字符串作为对话框的标题显示。如果未指定此选项,则显示默认标题。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a string to display as the title of the dialog box. If this option is not specified, then a default title will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个字符串作为对话框的标题显示。如果没有指定此选项,则会显示默认的标题。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a string to display as the title of the message box. This option is ignored on Mac OS X, where platform guidelines forbid the use of a title on this kind of dialog.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个字符串作为消息框的标题显示。在Mac OS X上,此选项被忽略,因为平台指南禁止在这类对话框中使用标题。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a string to display at the right side of the menu entry. Normally describes an accelerator keystroke sequence that may be typed to invoke the same function as the menu entry. This option is not available for separator or tear-off entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定显示在菜单项右侧的字符串。通常描述了一个加速器的击键序列,可以通过输入来调用与菜单项相同的功能。此选项不适用于分隔符或分离符条目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a text string to be displayed inside the widget (unless overridden by -textvariable).
trans-unit.target: 指定要在小部件内显示的文本字符串（除非被-textvariable覆盖）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a toolwindow style window (as defined in the MSDN).
trans-unit.target: 指定一个工具窗口样式的窗口(在MSDN中定义)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a value indicating the total width of the insertion cursor. The value may have any of the forms acceptable to Tk_GetPixels. If a border has been specified for the insertion cursor (using the -insertborderwidth option), the border will be drawn inside the width specified by the -insertwidth option.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个值，该值指示插入光标的总宽度。该值可以具有Tk_GetPixels可接受的任何形式。如果为插入光标指定了边界（使用-insertborderwidth选项），则将在-insertwidth选项指定的宽度内绘制边界。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a widget to use as label. This overrides any -text option. The widget must exist before being used as -labelwidget and if it is not a descendant of this window, it will be raised above it in the stacking order.
trans-unit.target: 指定用作标签的小部件。这将覆盖任何-text选项。该小部件在用作-labelwidget之前必须存在，如果它不是此窗口的后代，则将按堆叠顺序在其上方升高。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an alternate format to use when setting the string value when using the -from and -to range. This must be a format specifier of the form %<pad>.<pad>f, as it will format a floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用-from和-to范围设置字符串值时要使用的替代格式。这必须是格式为％<pad>。<pad> f的格式说明符，因为它将格式化浮点数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an alternative relief for the button, to be used when the mouse cursor is over the widget. This option can be used to make toolbar buttons, by configuring -relief flat -overrelief raised. If the value of this option is the empty string, then no alternative relief is used when the mouse cursor is over the button. The empty string is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 指定按钮的替代浮雕，当鼠标光标悬停在小部件上方时使用。通过配置-relief flat-overrelief提高，可以使用此选项来制作工具栏按钮。如果此选项的值为空字符串，则当鼠标光标位于按钮上方时，不会使用其他替代方法。空字符串是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an alternative relief for the checkbutton, to be used when the mouse cursor is over the widget. This option can be used to make toolbar buttons, by configuring -relief flat -overrelief raised. If the value of this option is the empty string, then no alternative relief is used when the mouse cursor is over the checkbutton. The empty string is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 指定复选按钮的替补，当鼠标光标悬停在小部件上时使用。通过配置-relief flat-overrelief提高，可以使用此选项来制作工具栏按钮。如果此选项的值为空字符串，则当鼠标光标悬停在复选按钮上方时，不会使用其他替代方法。空字符串是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an alternative relief for the radiobutton, to be used when the mouse cursor is over the widget. This option can be used to make toolbar buttons, by configuring -relief flat -overrelief raised. If the value of this option is the empty string, then no alternative relief is used when the mouse cursor is over the radiobutton. The empty string is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 指定单选按钮的替代浮雕，当鼠标光标悬停在小部件上方时使用。通过配置-relief flat-overrelief提高，可以使用此选项来制作工具栏按钮。如果此选项的值为空字符串，则当鼠标光标位于单选按钮上方时，将不使用其他替代方法。空字符串是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an auxiliary message to the main message given by the -message option. The message detail will be presented beneath the main message and, where supported by the OS, in a less emphasized font than the main message.
trans-unit.target: 为-message选项给定的主要消息指定辅助消息。消息详细信息将显示在主消息下方，并且在操作系统支持的情况下，其字体将比主消息强调的字体少。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an icon to display.
trans-unit.target: 指定要显示的图标。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display (in place of the -image option) when the checkbutton is in tri-state mode. This option is ignored unless the -image option has been specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定当复选按钮处于三态模式时要显示的图像（代替-image选项）。除非已指定-image选项，否则将忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display (in place of the -image option) when the checkbutton is selected. This option is ignored unless the -image option has been specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定选中复选框后要显示的图像（代替-image选项）。除非已指定-image选项，否则将忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display (in place of the -image option) when the radiobutton is selected. This option is ignored unless the -image option has been specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定选中单选按钮时要显示的图像（代替-image选项）。除非已指定-image选项，否则将忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display in the menu instead of a text string or bitmap. The image must have been created by some previous invocation of image create. This option overrides the -label and -bitmap options (as controlled by the -compound option) but may be reset to an empty string to enable a textual or bitmap label to be displayed. This option is not available for separator or tear-off entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在菜单中显示的图像，而不是文本字符串或位图。该映像必须已经通过先前对image create的调用而创建。此选项将覆盖-label和-bitmap选项（如由受控-化合物选项），但可被重置为空字符串，以使要被显示的文本或位图的标签。此选项不适用于分隔符或撕下条目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display in the tab. See
trans-unit.target: 指定要在选项卡中显示的图像。参见

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display in the widget, which must have been created with the image create command. Typically, if the -image option is specified then it overrides other options that specify a bitmap or textual value to display in the widget, though this is controlled by the -compound option; the -image option may be reset to an empty string to re-enable a bitmap or text display.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在小部件中显示的图像，该图像必须已使用image create命令创建。通常，如果指定了-image选项，则它会覆盖其他指定要在窗口小部件中显示的位图或文本值的选项，尽管这是由-compound选项控制的；该-Image选项可被重置为空字符串，以重新启用位图或文本显示。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display to the right of the column heading.
trans-unit.target: 指定要显示在列标题右边的图像。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display. This is a list of 1 or more elements. The first element is the default image name. The rest of the list is a sequence of
trans-unit.target: 指定要显示的图像。这是一个包含1个或多个元素的列表。第一个元素是默认的图像名称。列表的其余部分是一系列的

trans-unit.source: Specifies an increment for horizontal scrolling, in any of the usual forms permitted for screen distances. If the value of this option is greater than zero, the horizontal view in the window will be constrained so that the canvas x coordinate at the left edge of the window is always an even multiple of xScrollIncrement; furthermore, the units for scrolling (e.g., the change in view when the left and right arrows of a scrollbar are selected) will also be xScrollIncrement. If the value of this option is less than or equal to zero, then horizontal scrolling is unconstrained.
trans-unit.target: 指定水平滚动的增量，采用屏幕距离允许的任何常用形式。如果此选项的值大于零，则将限制窗口的水平视图，以使窗口左边缘的canvas x坐标始终是xScrollIncrement的偶数倍；此外，用于滚动的单位（例如，当选择滚动条的向左和向右箭头时的视图变化）也将为xScrollIncrement。如果此选项的值小于或等于零，则水平滚动不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an increment for vertical scrolling, in any of the usual forms permitted for screen distances. If the value of this option is greater than zero, the vertical view in the window will be constrained so that the canvas y coordinate at the top edge of the window is always an even multiple of yScrollIncrement; furthermore, the units for scrolling (e.g., the change in view when the top and bottom arrows of a scrollbar are selected) will also be yScrollIncrement. If the value of this option is less than or equal to zero, then vertical scrolling is unconstrained.
trans-unit.target: 指定垂直滚动的增量，采用屏幕距离允许的任何常用形式。如果此选项的值大于零，则将限制窗口中的垂直视图，以使窗口顶部边缘的画布y坐标始终是yScrollIncrement的偶数倍；此外，用于滚动的单位（例如，当选择滚动条的上下箭头时视图的变化）也将为yScrollIncrement。如果此选项的值小于或等于零，则垂直滚动不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an integer line index representing the first line of the underlying textual data store that should be contained in the widget. This allows a text widget to reflect only a portion of a larger piece of text. Instead of an integer, the empty string can be provided to this configuration option, which will configure the widget to start at the very first line in the textual data store.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个整数行索引,代表小组件中应包含的底层文本数据存储的第一行。这允许文本小组件仅反映较大文本的一部分。可以向此配置选项提供空字符串,而不是整数,这将配置小组件从文本数据存储中的第一行开始。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an integer line index representing the line of the underlying textual data store that should be just after the last line contained in the widget. This allows a text widget to reflect only a portion of a larger piece of text. Instead of an integer, the empty string can be provided to this configuration option, which will configure the widget to end at the very last line in the textual data store.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个整数行索引,代表底层文本数据存储的行,该行应位于小组件中包含的最后一行之后。这允许文本小组件仅反映较大文本的一部分。可以向此配置选项提供空字符串,而不是整数,这将配置小组件在文本数据存储中的最后一行结束。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an integer value indicating the desired width of the entry window, in average-size characters of the widget's font.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个整数值,表示输入窗口的宽度,以小组件字体的平均大小表示。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an integer value indicating the desired width of the entry window, in average-size characters of the widget's font. If the value is less than or equal to zero, the widget picks a size just large enough to hold its current text.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个整数值,表示输入窗口所需的宽度,以小组件字体的平均大小字符表示。如果该值小于或等于零,小组件会选择一个足以容纳其当前文本的大小。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an integer value indicating the desired width of the spinbox window, in average-size characters of the widget's font. If the value is less than or equal to zero, the widget picks a size just large enough to hold its current text.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个整数值,表示旋转框窗口的理想宽度,以小组件字体的平均大小字符表示。如果该值小于或等于零,小组件会选择一个足够大的尺寸,以容纳其当前文本。

trans-unit.source: Specifies background color to use when drawing active elements. An element (a widget or portion of a widget) is active if the mouse cursor is positioned over the element and pressing a mouse button will cause some action to occur. If strict Motif compliance has been requested by setting the tk_strictMotif variable, this option will normally be ignored; the normal background color will be used instead. For some elements on Windows and Macintosh systems, the active color will only be used while mouse button 1 is pressed over the element.
trans-unit.target: 指定绘制活动元素时要使用的背景颜色。如果将鼠标光标放在元素上（该元素或一个窗口小部件的一部分），该元素（窗口小部件或窗口小部件的一部分）将处于活动状态，并且按下鼠标按钮将引起某些动作。如果通过设置tk_strictMotif变量要求严格遵守Motif ，则通常会忽略此选项；而是使用正常的背景色。对于Windows和Macintosh系统上的某些元素，仅​​当在元素上按下鼠标按钮1时，才会使用活动颜色。

trans-unit.source: Specifies foreground color to use when drawing a disabled element. If the option is specified as an empty string (which is typically the case on monochrome displays), disabled elements are drawn with the normal foreground color but they are dimmed by drawing them with a stippled fill pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定绘制禁用元素时要使用的前景色。如果该选项被指定为空字符串(通常是单色显示器上的情况),则禁用元素会以正常的前景色绘制,但会以点状的填充图案绘制,使其变暗。

trans-unit.source: Specifies foreground color to use when drawing active elements. See above for definition of active elements.
trans-unit.target: 指定绘制活动元素时要使用的前景色。活动元素的定义请参考上文。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the heading text should be aligned. One of the standard Tk anchor values.
trans-unit.target: 指定标题文字的排列方式。Tk标准锚值之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the image is placed within the final parcel.
trans-unit.target: 指定图像在最终包裹中的放置方式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the information in a widget (e.g. text or a bitmap) is to be displayed in the widget. Must be one of the values n, ne, e, se, s, sw, w, nw, or center. For example, nw means display the information such that its top-left corner is at the top-left corner of the widget.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何在窗口小部件中显示窗口小部件中的信息（例如，文本或位图）。必须是值n，ne，e，se，s，sw，w，nw或center之一。例如，nw表示显示信息，使其左上角位于小部件的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the information in the widget is positioned relative to the inner margins. Legal values are n, ne, e, se, s, sw, w, nw, and center. See also -justify.
trans-unit.target: 指定窗口小部件中的信息相对于内部边距的位置。合法值为n，ne，e，se，s，sw，w，nw和center。另请参见-justify。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the slave window is positioned within the pane area. Value is a string containing zero or more of the characters n, s, e, or w. Each letter refers to a side (north, south, east, or west) that the slave window will “stick” to, as per the grid geometry manager.
trans-unit.target: 指定从属窗口在窗格区域内的放置方式。值是一个包含零个或多个字符n，s，e或w的字符串。根据网格几何管理器，每个字母都表示从属窗口将“粘贴”到的一侧（北，南，东或西）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the text in this column should be aligned with respect to the cell. One of n, ne, e, se, s, sw, w, nw, or center.
trans-unit.target: 指定此列中的文本应相对于单元格对齐的方式。一个ñ，NE，ē，SE，s ^，SW，W ^，NW，或中心。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the text is aligned within the entry widget. One of left, center, or right.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本在输入小部件中的对齐方式。其中的左，中心，或右。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the text is aligned within the widget. Must be one of left, center, or right.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本在小部件内的对齐方式。必须是left，center或right之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to display the image relative to the text, in the case both -text and -image are present. See
trans-unit.target: 指定如何显示相对于文本图像，在以下的情况下-text和-image都存在。看到

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to display the image relative to the text, in the case both -text and -image are present. Valid values are:
trans-unit.target: 指定如何显示相对于文本图像，在以下的情况下-text和-image都存在。有效值为：

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to display the insertion cursor when the widget does not have the focus. Must be none (the default) which means to not display the cursor, hollow which means to display a hollow box, or solid which means to display a solid box. Note that hollow and solid will appear very similar when the -blockcursor option is false.
trans-unit.target: 指定当窗口小部件没有焦点时如何显示插入光标。必须为none（默认值），表示不显示光标；空心（空心）表示显示空心框；或实体（solid）表示显示实心框。请注意，当-blockcursor选项为false 时，空心和实体将看起来非常相似。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to draw the arc. If
trans-unit.target: 指定如何绘制弧线。如果

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to handle lines in the text that are too long to be displayed in a single line of the text's window. The value must be none or char or word. A wrap mode of none means that each line of text appears as exactly one line on the screen; extra characters that do not fit on the screen are not displayed. In the other modes each line of text will be broken up into several screen lines if necessary to keep all the characters visible. In char mode a screen line break may occur after any character; in word mode a line break will only be made at word boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何处理文本中太长而无法在文本窗口的一行中显示的行。该值必须为none或char或word。的涡卷模式没有装置，其每行文本显示为屏幕上的正好一个线;屏幕上不显示多余的字符。在其他模式下，如果需要保持所有字符可见，则每行文本都将分成几行屏幕。在字符模式下，任何字符后都可能出现屏幕换行符；在单词模式下，仅在单词边界处会出现换行符。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to interpret the relationship between tab stops on a line and tabs in the text of that line. The value must be tabular (the default) or wordprocessor. Note that tabs are interpreted as they are encountered in the text. If the tab style is tabular then the
trans-unit.target: 指定如何解释行上的制表位和该行文本中的制表符之间的关系。该值必须为表格格式（默认）或字处理器。请注意，在文本中遇到选项卡时，将对它们进行解释。如果标签样式为表格形式，则

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to justify lines of text. Must be one of left, center, or right. Defaults to left. This option works together with the -anchor, -aspect, -padx, -pady, and -width options to provide a variety of arrangements of the text within the window. The -aspect and -width options determine the amount of screen space needed to display the text. The -anchor, -padx, and -pady options determine where this rectangular area is displayed within the widget's window, and the -justify option determines how each line is displayed within that rectangular region. For example, suppose -anchor is e and -justify is left, and that the message window is much larger than needed for the text. The text will be displayed so that the left edges of all the lines line up and the right edge of the longest line is -padx from the right side of the window; the entire text block will be centered in the vertical span of the window.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何对齐文本行。必须是left，center或right之一。默认为left。此选项与一起工作-锚定，-aspect，-padx，-pady和-width选项提供了多种的窗口中的文本的安排。的-aspect和-width选项确定的要显示的文本需要屏幕空间量。本-锚定，-padx和-pady选项确定哪里是小部件的窗口内显示该矩形区域，以及-justify选项确定如何在该矩形区域内显示每条线。例如，假设-anchor为e且-justify为left，并且消息窗口比文本所需的大得多。将显示文本，以使所有行的左边缘对齐，最长行的右边缘从窗口的右侧开始是-padx；整个文本块将在窗口的垂直范围内居中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to justify the text within its bounding region.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何在其边界区域内对文本进行标注。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to output color information.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何输出颜色信息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how transparent pixels in the source image are combined with the destination image. When a compositing rule of
trans-unit.target: 指定源图像中的透明像素与目标图像的组合方式。当合成规则的

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the widget should display text and bitmaps/images at the same time, and if so, where the bitmap/image should be placed relative to the text. Must be one of the values none, bottom, top, left, right, or center. For example, the (default) value none specifies that the bitmap or image should (if defined) be displayed instead of the text, the value left specifies that the bitmap or image should be displayed to the left of the text, and the value center specifies that the bitmap or image should be displayed on top of the text.
trans-unit.target: 指定窗口小部件是否应同时显示文本和位图/图像，如果是，则指定相对于文本放置位图/图像的位置。必须是值none，bottom，top，left，right或center之一。例如，（默认）值none指定应显示位图或图像（如果已定义）而不是文本，left值指定应将位图或图像显示在文本的左侧，值中心指定位图或图像应显示在文本顶部。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of several styles for manipulating the selection. The value of the option may be arbitrary, but the default bindings expect it to be either single, browse, multiple, or extended; the default value is browse.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于操纵选择的几种样式之一。该选项的值可以是任意的，但是默认绑定期望它是single，Browse，multiple或extended。默认值为browser。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the button: normal, active, or disabled. In normal state the button is displayed using the -foreground and -background options. The active state is typically used when the pointer is over the button. In active state the button is displayed using the -activeforeground and -activebackground options. Disabled state means that the button should be insensitive: the default bindings will refuse to activate the widget and will ignore mouse button presses. In this state the -disabledforeground and -background options determine how the button is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指定按钮的三种状态之一：正常，活动或禁用。在正常状态下使用显示的按钮-foreground和-background选项。当指针位于按钮上方时，通常使用活动状态。在活动状态下，使用-activeforeground和-activebackground选项显示按钮。禁用状态意味着按钮应该不敏感：默认绑定将拒绝激活小部件，并且将忽略鼠标按键的按下。在这种状态下，-disabledforeground和-background选项决定了按钮的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the checkbutton: normal, active, or disabled. In normal state the checkbutton is displayed using the -foreground and -background options. The active state is typically used when the pointer is over the checkbutton. In active state the checkbutton is displayed using the -activeforeground and -activebackground options. Disabled state means that the checkbutton should be insensitive: the default bindings will refuse to activate the widget and will ignore mouse button presses. In this state the -disabledforeground and -background options determine how the checkbutton is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 为检查按钮指定以下三种状态之一：正常，活动或禁用。在正常状态下使用显示checkbutton -foreground和-background选项。当指针位于复选按钮上方时，通常使用活动状态。在活动状态下，使用-activeforeground和-activebackground选项显示复选按钮。禁用状态意味着该复选按钮应该不敏感：默认绑定将拒绝激活该小部件，并且将忽略鼠标按键的按下。在这种状态下，-disabledforeground和-background 选项确定复选按钮的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the default ring: normal, active, or disabled. In active state, the button is drawn with the platform specific appearance for a default button. In normal state, the button is drawn with the platform specific appearance for a non-default button, leaving enough space to draw the default button appearance. The normal and active states will result in buttons of the same size. In disabled state, the button is drawn with the non-default button appearance without leaving space for the default appearance. The disabled state may result in a smaller button than the active state.
trans-unit.target: 指定默认振铃的三种状态之一：normal，active或disabled。在活动状态下，将使用默认按钮的平台特定外观来绘制按钮。在正常状态下，将使用非默认按钮的特定平台外观绘制按钮，从而留出足够的空间来绘制默认按钮外观。正常和活动状态将导致按钮的大小相同。在禁用状态下，将以非默认按钮外观绘制按钮，而不会为默认外观留出空间。禁用状态可能会导致按钮比活动状态小。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the entry: normal, active, or disabled. In normal state the entry is displayed using the -foreground option for the menu and the -background option from the entry or the menu. The active state is typically used when the pointer is over the entry. In active state the entry is displayed using the -activeforeground option for the menu along with the -activebackground option from the entry. Disabled state means that the entry should be insensitive: the default bindings will refuse to activate or invoke the entry. In this state the entry is displayed according to the -disabledforeground option for the menu and the -background option from the entry. This option is not available for separator entries.
trans-unit.target: 指定条目的三种状态之一：正常，活动或禁用。在正常状态下使用显示的输入-foreground的菜单选项和-background从条目或菜单选项。当指针位于条目上方时，通常使用活动状态。在活动状态是使用显示的输入-activeforeground为与沿菜单选项-activebackground从入门选择。禁用状态表示该条目应该不敏感：默认绑定将拒绝激活或调用该条目。在此状态下，根据-disabledforeground显示条目菜单中的选项，以及条目中的-background选项。此选项不适用于分隔符条目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the entry: normal, disabled, or readonly. If the entry is readonly, then the value may not be changed using widget commands and no insertion cursor will be displayed, even if the input focus is in the widget; the contents of the widget may still be selected. If the entry is disabled, the value may not be changed, no insertion cursor will be displayed, the contents will not be selectable, and the entry may be displayed in a different color, depending on the values of the -disabledforeground and -disabledbackground options.
trans-unit.target: 指定条目的三种状态之一：normal，disabled或readonly。如果条目是只读的，那么即使输入焦点在窗口小部件中，也不能使用窗口小部件命令来更改该值，并且不会显示插入光标。小部件的内容仍然可以选择。如果禁用了该条目，则该值可能不会更改，将不会显示插入光标，将无法选择其内容，并且该条目可能会以不同的颜色显示，具体取决于-disabledforeground和-disabledbackground选项的值。。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the label: normal, active, or disabled. In normal state the button is displayed using the -foreground and -background options. In active state the label is displayed using the -activeforeground and -activebackground options. In the disabled state the -disabledforeground and -background options determine how the button is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指定标签的三种状态之一：正常，活动或禁用。在正常状态下使用显示的按钮-foreground和-background选项。在活动状态下，使用-activeforeground和-activebackground选项显示标签。在禁用状态-disabledforeground和-background选项决定了按钮的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the menubutton: normal, active, or disabled. In normal state the menubutton is displayed using the foreground and background options. The active state is typically used when the pointer is over the menubutton. In active state the menubutton is displayed using the -activeforeground and -activebackground options. Disabled state means that the menubutton should be insensitive: the default bindings will refuse to activate the widget and will ignore mouse button presses. In this state the -disabledforeground and -background options determine how the button is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指定菜单按钮的三种状态之一：正常，活动或禁用。在正常状态下，使用前景和背景选项显示菜单按钮。当指针在菜单按钮上方时，通常使用活动状态。在活动状态下，使用-activeforeground和-activebackground选项显示菜单按钮。禁用状态意味着菜单按钮应该不敏感：默认绑定将拒绝激活小部件，并且将忽略鼠标按键的按下。在这种状态下，-disabledforeground和-background选项决定了按钮的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the radiobutton: normal, active, or disabled. In normal state the radiobutton is displayed using the -foreground and -background options. The active state is typically used when the pointer is over the radiobutton. In active state the radiobutton is displayed using the -activeforeground and -activebackground options. Disabled state means that the radiobutton should be insensitive: the default bindings will refuse to activate the widget and will ignore mouse button presses. In this state the -disabledforeground and -background options determine how the radiobutton is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指定单选按钮的三种状态之一：正常，活动或禁用。在正常状态下使用显示的单选按钮-foreground和-background选项。当指针在单选按钮上方时，通常使用活动状态。在活动状态下，使用-activeforeground和-activebackground选项显示单选按钮。禁用状态意味着单选按钮应该不敏感：默认绑定将拒绝激活小部件，并且将忽略鼠标按钮的按下。在这种状态下，-disabledforeground和-background 选项确定单选按钮的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the scale: normal, active, or disabled. If the scale is disabled then the value may not be changed and the scale will not activate. If the scale is active, the slider is displayed using the color specified by the -activebackground option.
trans-unit.target: 指定比例的三种状态之一：正常，活动或禁用。如果比例尺被禁用，则该值可能不会更改，并且比例尺也不会激活。如果比例尺处于活动状态，则使用-activebackground选项指定的颜色显示滑块。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of three states for the spinbox: normal, disabled, or readonly. If the spinbox is readonly, then the value may not be changed using widget commands and no insertion cursor will be displayed, even if the input focus is in the widget; the contents of the widget may still be selected. If the spinbox is disabled, the value may not be changed, no insertion cursor will be displayed, the contents will not be selectable, and the spinbox may be displayed in a different color, depending on the values of the -disabledforeground and -disabledbackground options.
trans-unit.target: 为旋转框指定以下三种状态之一：正常，禁用或只读。如果旋转框是只读的，那么即使输入焦点位于窗口小部件中，也不能使用窗口小部件命令更改该值，并且不会显示插入光标。小部件的内容仍然可以选择。如果禁用了旋转框，则该值将不会更改，将不会显示插入光标，将不会选择内容，并且旋转框可能会以不同的颜色显示，具体取决于-disabledforeground和-disabledbackground选项的值。。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of two states for the listbox: normal or disabled. If the listbox is disabled then items may not be inserted or deleted, items are drawn in the -disabledforeground color, and selection cannot be modified and is not shown (though selection information is retained).
trans-unit.target: 指定列表框的两种状态之一：正常或禁用。如果禁用了列表框，则可能无法插入或删除项目，项目会以-disabledforeground颜色绘制，并且无法修改选择并且不显示选择（尽管选择信息会保留）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies one of two states for the text: normal or disabled. If the text is disabled then characters may not be inserted or deleted and no insertion cursor will be displayed, even if the input focus is in the widget.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本的两种状态之一：正常或禁用。如果禁用了文本，则即使输入焦点在小部件中，也可能不会插入或删除字符，也不会显示插入光标。

trans-unit.source: Specifies process notification state (bouncing of the application dock icon).
trans-unit.target: 指定进程通知状态(应用程序停靠图标的跳动)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a number should always be printed with a sign, even if positive.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个数字应该总是用符号打印,即使是正数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a space should be added to the beginning of the number if the first character is not a sign.
trans-unit.target: 指定如果第一个字符不是符号,则应在数字的开头加一个空格。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that any relative times present in a clock scan command are to be given relative to
trans-unit.target: 指定相对于时钟扫描命令中存在的任何相对时间

trans-unit.source: Specifies that clock arithmetic, formatting, and scanning are to be done according to the rules for the time zone specified by
trans-unit.target: 指定时钟运算、格式化和扫描将根据由

trans-unit.source: Specifies that locale-dependent scanning and formatting (and date arithmetic for dates preceding the adoption of the Gregorian calendar) is to be done in the locale identified by
trans-unit.target: 指定根据当地情况进行扫描和格式化(以及对采用公历之前的日期进行日期运算),在由

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the Postscript should be scaled in both x and y so that the printed area is
trans-unit.target: 指定 Postscript 应在 x 和 y 两个方向上进行缩放,以使打印的区域为 x 和 y。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the colors allocated for displaying this image in a window should be corrected for a non-linear display with the specified gamma exponent value. (The intensity produced by most CRT displays is a power function of the input value, to a good approximation; gamma is the exponent and is typically around 2). The value specified must be greater than zero. The default value is one (no correction). In general, values greater than one will make the image lighter, and values less than one will make it darker.
trans-unit.target: 指定在窗口中显示此图像所分配的颜色应该用指定的伽马指数值对非线性显示进行校正。大多数CRT显示器产生的强度是输入值的幂函数,是一个很好的近似值;伽马是指数,通常在2左右)。指定的值必须大于零。默认值是1(无校正)。一般来说,大于1的值会使图像变亮,小于1的值会使图像变暗。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the connection will not modify the database (if the Boolean parameter
trans-unit.target: 指定连接将不会修改数据库(如果布尔参数

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the converted argument should be left-justified in its field (numbers are normally right-justified with leading spaces if needed).
trans-unit.target: 指定转换后的参数在其字段中应该是左对齐的(如果需要的话,数字通常是右对齐的,有前导空格)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the directories in
trans-unit.target: 指定在

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the files in
trans-unit.target: 指定在

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the main window for the application is to be embedded in the window whose identifier is
trans-unit.target: 指定应用程序的主窗口将被嵌入到标识符为-的窗口中。
